quote: He didn't see the look his brothers shared or overhear the vow they made to one another--that if any one of the four of them were to make it back from Ticonderoga, it would be Iain.
quote_letters: HE DIDNT SEE THE LOOK HIS BROTHERS SHARED OR OVERHEAR THE VOW THEY MADE TO ONE ANOTHER--THAT IF ANY ONE OF THE FOUR OF THEM WERE TO MAKE IT BACK FROM TICONDEROGA IT WOULD BE IAIN
